content:
Ignoring the risks and consequences of your actions, you decide to head for the highway. Once there, you floor the gas pedal, pushing your car to its limits. As you speed down the highway, your impaired driving skills and the high speed make it incredibly difficult for you to control the vehicle.

Other drivers on the road start honking at you, swerving out of the way to avoid collisions. The situation is extremely dangerous, and there's a high chance of a severe accident occurring if you continue down this path.

[INVENTORY]: Wallet, keys, smartphone, Walmart name tag, open vodka bottle

What do you want to do?
